titlestmt.titleproper: Speedwell Avenue Chapel Drop-in-the Bucket Union Missionary records 1911-1943
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012

did.unittitle: Speedwell Avenue Chapel Drop-in-the Bucket Union Missionary records

bioghist.p: The Speedwell Avenue Chapel Drop-in-the Bucket Union Missionary Society was organized on May 26, 1911.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of records of the Speedwell Avenue Chapel Drop-in-the Bucket Union Missionary Society. Materials include minutes and reports, 1911-1916 and 1925-1943 (2 volumes) Minutes discuss routine business including election of officers as well as sewing projects and addresses by visitors. Treasurer's records, 1924-1943 (1 volume), include records of payments of dues, special collections, and work done by members. This volume was also used as a scrapbook with photographs of India and Japan, postcards, newspaper clippings related to Society events and activities, and other inserts.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.

acqinfo.p: Provenance: Presbyterian Church on the Green
